briefdescription.para: The result of the effect is not rendered, but is passed on to following effects in the stack.
The result of the effect is rendered on the destination, but does not affect subsequent effects in the stack.
The result of the effect is both rendered and passed on to subsequent effects in the stack.
Drawing modes for effects.

detaileddescription.para:
These modes are used only when effects are drawn as part of an effects stack
QgsEffectStack

briefdescription.para: Constructor for QgsPaintEffect.
Begins intercepting paint operations to a render context.

detaileddescription.para:
When the corresponding end() member is called all intercepted paint operations will be drawn to the render context after being modified by the effect.
context
destination render context
end
render

briefdescription.para: Duplicates an effect by creating a deep copy of the effect.
Returns the draw mode for the effect.

detaileddescription.para:
This property only has an effect if the paint effect is used in a QgsEffectStack.
draw mode for effect
setDrawMode

briefdescription.para: Returns whether the effect is enabled.
Ends interception of paint operations to a render context, and draws the result to the render context after being modified by the effect.
Returns the properties describing the paint effect encoded in a string format.

simplesect.para: string map of properties, in the form property key, value

briefdescription.para: Reads a string map of an effect's properties and restores the effect to the state described by the properties map.

parameterdescription.para: effect properties encoded in a string map

briefdescription.para: Restores the effect to the state described by a DOM element.

parameterdescription.para: DOM element describing an effect's state

briefdescription.para: Renders a picture using the effect.
Saves the current state of the effect to a DOM element.

detaileddescription.para:
The default behavior is to save the properties string map returned by properties().
doc
destination DOM document
element
destination DOM element
true if save was successful
readProperties

detaileddescription.para:
This property only has an effect if the paint effect is used in a QgsEffectStack.
drawMode
draw mode for effect
drawMode

briefdescription.para: Sets whether the effect is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: set to false to disable the effect

briefdescription.para: Returns the effect type.

simplesect.para: unique string representation of the effect type

briefdescription.para: Returns the bounding rect required for drawing the effect.

detaileddescription.para:
This method can be used to expand the bounding rect of a source picture to account for offset or blurring effects.
rect

context
destination render context
modified bounding rect
sourceAsImage

briefdescription.para: Handles drawing of the effect's result on to the specified render context.

detaileddescription.para:
Derived classes must reimplement this method to apply any transformations to the source QPicture and draw the result using the context's painter.
context
destination render context

briefdescription.para: Draws the source QPicture onto the specified painter.

detaileddescription.para:
Handles scaling of the picture to account for the destination painter's DPI.
painter
destination painter
source

briefdescription.para: Applies a workaround to a QPainter to avoid an issue with incorrect scaling when drawing QPictures.

detaileddescription.para:
This may need to be called by derived classes prior to rendering results onto a painter.
painter
destination painter

briefdescription.para: Returns the offset which should be used when drawing the source image on to a destination render context.

simplesect.para: point offset for image top left corner

briefdescription.para: Returns the source QPicture.

detaileddescription.para:
The draw() member can utilize this when drawing the effect.
source QPicture
drawSource
sourceAsImage

briefdescription.para: Returns the source QPicture rendered to a new QImage.

detaileddescription.para:
The draw() member can utilize this when drawing the effect. The image will be padded or cropped from the original source QPicture by the results of the boundingRect() method. The result is cached to speed up subsequent calls to sourceAsImage.
source QPicture rendered to an image
drawSource
source
imageOffset
boundingRect

briefdescription.para: Base class for visual effects which can be applied to QPicture drawings.

detaileddescription.para: QgsPaintEffect objects can be used to modify QPicture drawings prior to rendering them with a QPainter operation. There are two methods for drawing using an effect, either drawing a picture directly, or by intercepting drawing operations to a render context.
To directly draw a picture, use the render() method with a source QPicture and destination render context.

Intercepting drawing operations to a render context is achieved by first calling the begin() method, passing a render context. Any drawing operations performed on the render context will not directly affect the context's paint device. When the drawing operations have been completed, call the end() method. This will perform the paint effect on the intercepted drawing operations and render the result to the render context's paint device.
